RuleSet.Name: schema/dbcreate/oracle/crsp_page_dbtablename_by_suffix.oracle
RuleSet.GenRule: $switch SecScope None implOracleSPPageTableRetSelectByIndexNormal System implOracleSPPageTableRetSelectByIndexNormal Cluster implOracleSPPageTableRetSelectByIndexRestrictCluster Tenant implOracleSPPageTableRetSelectByIndexRestrictTenant default error$

if( ( isSystemUser = 1 ) and ( $poptop Table reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implOraclePriorNotNull each implOracleAndPriorNotNull )$ ) ) then open retCursor for select * from ( select $poptop Table implOracleSelectTableColumns$, $poptop Table lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $poptop Table lower DbSchemaName$.$poptop Table DbTableName$ $poptop Table lower ClassCode$$poptop Table switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implOracleClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$ where $iterate Columns( first implOracleIndexColumnWhereFragBindVar each implOracleIndexColumnWhereAndFragBindVar )$$poptop Table restrictReadByIndexQuery$$restrictAndBeforePrior$$switch IsUnique yes empty default implSPReadTableOrderByDescendingPKey$ ) where ROWNUM <= 25; end if; if( ( isSystemUser = 1 ) and ( not ( $poptop Table reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implOraclePriorNotNull each implOracleAndPriorNotNull )$ ) ) ) then open retCursor for select * from ( select $poptop Table implOracleSelectTableColumns$, $poptop Table lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $poptop Table lower DbSchemaName$.$poptop Table DbTableName$ $poptop Table lower ClassCode$$poptop Table switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implOracleClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$ where $iterate Columns( first implOracleIndexColumnWhereFragBindVar each implOracleIndexColumnWhereAndFragBindVar )$$poptop Table restrictReadByIndexQuery$$switch IsUnique yes empty default implSPReadTableOrderByDescendingPKey$ ) where ROWNUM <= 25; end if;$implOracleSPPageTableRetSelectByIndexRestrictClusterPart2$

if( ( isSystemUser = 1 ) and ( $poptop Table reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implOraclePriorNotNull each implOracleAndPriorNotNull )$ ) ) then open retCursor for select * from ( select $poptop Table implOracleSelectTableColumns$, $poptop Table lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $poptop Table lower DbSchemaName$.$poptop Table DbTableName$ $poptop Table lower ClassCode$$poptop Table switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implOracleClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$ where $iterate Columns( first implOracleIndexColumnWhereFragBindVar each implOracleIndexColumnWhereAndFragBindVar )$$poptop Table restrictReadByIndexQuery$$restrictAndBeforePrior$$switch IsUnique yes empty default implSPReadTableOrderByDescendingPKey$ ) where ROWNUM <= 25; end if; if( ( isSystemUser = 1 ) and ( not ( $poptop Table reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implOraclePriorNotNull each implOracleAndPriorNotNull )$ ) ) ) then open retCursor for select * from ( select $poptop Table implOracleSelectTableColumns$, $poptop Table lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $poptop Table lower DbSchemaName$.$poptop Table DbTableName$ $poptop Table lower ClassCode$$poptop Table switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implOracleClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$ where $iterate Columns( first implOracleIndexColumnWhereFragBindVar each implOracleIndexColumnWhereAndFragBindVar )$$poptop Table restrictReadByIndexQuery$$switch IsUnique yes empty default implSPReadTableOrderByDescendingPKey$ ) where ROWNUM <= 25; end if;$implOracleSPPageTableRetSelectByIndexRestrictTenantPart2$
